plot: Larry may be a little unusual, but he's just like anyone who works in a cubicle at a big corporation. He tries to keep himself occupied, but sometimes the distractions are just too much to bear. What's a guy to do, but give in to them?
title: Button Pusher
plot_es: Larry may be a little unusual, but he's just like anyone who works in a cubicle at a big corporation. He tries to keep himself occupied, but sometimes the distractions are just too much to bear. What's a guy to do, but give in to them?
plot_en: Larry may be a little unusual, but he's just like anyone who works in a cubicle at a big corporation. He tries to keep himself occupied, but sometimes the distractions are just too much to bear. What's a guy to do, but give in to them?
